article.headline: TCU 79, Southern Miss 67
article.story: FORT WORTH, Texas (AP) -- Marcus Shropshire scored 29 points to lead TCU to a 79-67 win over Southern Mississippi on Wednesday night. Corey Santee added 19 points and Nucleus Smith had 13 for TCU (7-10, 3-3 Conference USA). Southern Mississippi (9-8, 2-4) was led by Charles Gaines with 20 points and 14 rebounds. TCU led from the outset after outscoring Southern Mississippi 13-2 in the game's opening minutes. The Golden Eagles cut TCU's lead to 16-11 with 8:49 remaining in the first half before the Horned Frogs went on a 7-0 run to lead 23-11. TCU was ahead 33-25 at halftime and never trailed in the second half. Southern Mississippi cut the lead to 41-37 with 13:53 left but TCU then scored five unanswered points and the Golden Eagles didn't threaten again.
